### ***Genome Track Browser***

Use this module to **query specific gene(s) and generate graphs for publications.**

In addition to calculating gene scores, PlaqView can also visualize the nearby chromatin accessibility, as powered by ArchR. Details for this visualization can be found [here](https://www.archrproject.com/bookdown/track-plotting-with-archrbrowser.html).
